attributes.action: ensure no eco-town is built without a railway station
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is essential that new towns that purport to be eco-friendly provide an alternative to ever increasing private car use, and a local railway station is a vital part of this.

Providing new railway stations would also increase the desirability of the eco-towns, unlike many post-war new towns such as Thamesmead, which still suffer today from poor public transport.
